     int numOfSources,
     int numOfTrees,
     double hungry)
        Creates the world.
        Parameters:
        numOfBeehives - the number of (actual) bees
        numOfTrees - the number of (actual) trees
        numOfSources - the number of (actual) sources
        width - x-dimension of this world
        height - y-dimension of this world
        hungry -

    • Method Detail

      • createBeehive

        public Beehive createBeehive(int numOfThisBeehive)
        Creates the beehive(s), one per time. Adds the created beehive to the list.
        Parameters:
        numOfBees - number of bees
        numOfThisBeehive - number of this beehive
        hungry - how much food does each bee take from the beehive per time
        Returns:
        the created beehive

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPosition(int maxX,
                                                 int maxY,
                                                 int count,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> array)
        Helper function for getting random positions in world for sources and beehive.
        Parameters:
        maxX - in most times x-size of the world
        maxY - in most times y-size of the world
        count - number of xy-pairs to create
        array - not really needed, is it?
        Returns:
        array of all xy-pairs
